It also lists minutes for the Audit Committee and includes some miscellaneous files such as "Noida International" and "NOTIFICATION1."

admission_requirements.summary: This text provides information related to university admissions and academic programs, specifically mentioning CUET counselling, the admission process, course and fee structures for 2025-26, scholarship and loan options, transport and hostel facilities, and admission alerts. It also highlights resources for Ph.D. admissions and includes details about a domestic brochure for Indian students.
